widget.name: FocusHelper
widget.description: A helper tool that can set the focus on a form-control triggered by logic such as a microflow, nanoflow or pageload.

property.caption: Execute Immediately
property.description: Should the focus be set when the widget loads?

property.caption: Class to Target
property.description: Enter the class to target. (The widget will target the first `input` element inside the matching element).

property.caption: Form context object
property.description: The context object that will be monitored.

property.caption: Initialze attribute
property.description: The boolean attribute that, if set to true will trigger the focus.

property.caption: After focus microflow
property.description: The optional microflow to trigger after focus has been set.
